overall.description: Integrate along the given axis using the composite trapezoidal rule.

x.description: The sample points corresponding to the y values. If x is None, the sample points are assumed to be evenly spaced dx apart. The default is None.

dx.description: The spacing between sample points when x is None. The default is 1.

axis.description: The axis along which to integrate.

trapz.description: Definite integral as approximated by trapezoidal rule.
